snippet: At one point, Mr. Kaminsky represented about one-third of the players in the N.H.L., and he branched out to handle broadcasters.
abstract: Art Kaminsky, lawyer and sports and entertainment agent who at one time represented about one-third of the players in the National Hockey League, dies at age 66.
lead_paragraph: At one point, Mr. Kaminsky represented about one-third of the players in the N.H.L., and he branched out to handle broadcasters.

headline.main: Art Kaminsky, Whose Clients Won the ‘Miracle on Ice,’ Dies at 66
headline.print_headline: Art Kaminsky, 66; Knew the Value of Gold
